plot: This film explores the complex connections between community, industry, and the global environment through story of one of the longest running gold mines in the world, the Vatukoula Gold Mine in Fiji.
title: Rock of Gold
plot_es: This film explores the complex connections between community, industry, and the global environment through story of one of the longest running gold mines in the world, the Vatukoula Gold Mine in Fiji.
plot_en: This film explores the complex connections between community, industry, and the global environment through story of one of the longest running gold mines in the world, the Vatukoula Gold Mine in Fiji.
